signup.subtitle: Submit your application to join Bureau Boudoir
signup.successMessage: Application submitted! Check your email for confirmation.
signup.duplicateError: An application with this email already exists.
signup.submitError: Failed to submit application. Please try again.

hero.title: About Bureau Boudoir
hero.subtitle: Elevating Amsterdam creators through professional content management and strategic marketing

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: Born in the heart of Amsterdam's iconic Red Light District, Bureau Boudoir emerged from a simple vision: to transform the way creators approach their content business.
story.para2: We recognized that talented creators were spending countless hours on production, marketing, and business operations—time that could be better spent on what they do best: creating.
story.para3: Today, Bureau Boudoir stands as Amsterdam's premier content management agency, bringing together creative excellence, professional production standards, and strategic marketing expertise.

planning.title: Content Planning
planning.description: Strategic content calendars, shoot planning, and creative direction tailored to your unique style and audience.

production.title: Professional Production
production.description: Studio-quality photo and video production with experienced teams who understand luxury content creation.

marketing.title: Strategic Marketing
marketing.description: Data-driven marketing strategies, platform optimization, and growth tactics that maximize your reach and revenue.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: We bring industry-leading standards to every aspect of content creation and management.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.description: Your unique voice and vision are at the center of everything we do.

support.title: Support
support.description: 24/7 access to our team ensures you always have the guidance and resources you need.

empowerment.title: Empowerment
empowerment.description: We give creators the tools, knowledge, and confidence to build sustainable, successful businesses.

cta.title: Ready to elevate your content?
cta.description: Join Amsterdam's most professional creator community.

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Ready to begin your journey with Bureau Boudoir? We're here to help.

info.title: Contact Information
info.subtitle: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out through any of these channels.
